00021 using Gtk;
00022 using System;
00023 using System.IO;
00024 
00025 using Niry;
00026 using Niry.Utils;
00027 using NyFolder.GUI.Base;
00028 
00029 namespace NyFolder.GUI {
00031     public class FolderStore : Gtk.ListStore {
00032         // ============================================
00033         // PUBLIC CONST Members
00034         // ============================================
00035         public const int COL_PATH = 0;
00036         public const int COL_NAME = 1;
00037         public const int COL_PIXBUF = 2;
00038         public const int COL_IS_DIRECTORY = 3;
00039 
00040         // ============================================
00041         // PUBLIC Events
00042         // ============================================
00043         public event ObjectEventHandler DirectoryAdded = null;
00044         public event ObjectEventHandler FileAdded = null;
00045 
00046         // ============================================
00047         // PROTECTED Members
00048         // ============================================
00049         protected bool showHiddenFile;
00050 
00051         // ============================================
00052         // PRIVATE Members
00053         // ============================================
00054         private Gtk.TreeIter fIter;
00055         private string fPath;
00056         private bool isEmpty;
00057 
00058         // ============================================
00059         // PUBLIC Constructors
00060         // ============================================
00061         public FolderStore() : base(typeof(string), 
00062                                     typeof(string),
00063                                     typeof(Gdk.Pixbuf),
00064                                     typeof(bool))
00065         {
00066             showHiddenFile = true;
00067             fIter = Gtk.TreeIter.Zero;
00068             SetSortColumnId(COL_NAME, SortType.Ascending);
00069             DefaultSortFunc = new TreeIterCompareFunc(StoreSortFunc);
00070         }
00071 
00072         // ============================================
00073         // PUBLIC Methods
00074         // ============================================
00075         public new void Clear() {
00076             isEmpty = true;
00077             base.Clear();
00078             Append();
00079         }
00080 
00082         public void Add (string path) {
00083             if (Directory.Exists(path) == true) {
00084                 AddDirectory(path);
00085             } else if (File.Exists(path) == true) {
00086                 AddFile(path);
00087             }
00088         }
00089 
00091         public void AddFile (string path) {
00092             FileInfo fileInfo = new FileInfo(path);
00093             string ext = GetIconTypeName(fileInfo);
00094             Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf = StockIcons.GetFileIconPixbuf(ext);
00095             
00096             Gtk.TreeIter iter;
00097             iter = InsertData(path, fileInfo.Name, pixbuf, false);
00098 
00099             // File Added Event
00100             if (FileAdded != null) FileAdded(this, iter);
00101         }
00102 
00104         public void AddDirectory (string path) {
00105             DirectoryInfo dirInfo = new DirectoryInfo(path);
00106             Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf = StockIcons.GetPixbuf("Directory");
00107 
00108             Gtk.TreeIter iter;
00109             iter = InsertData(path, dirInfo.Name, pixbuf, true);
00110 
00111             // Directory Added Event
00112             if (DirectoryAdded != null) DirectoryAdded(this, iter);
00113         }
00114 
00116         public void Fill (string path) {
00117             // Now Go Through The Directory and Extract All The File Information
00118             if (Directory.Exists(path) == false)
00119                 return;
00120 
00121             // Get Root Directory
00122             DirectoryInfo rootDirectory = new DirectoryInfo(path);
00123 
00124             // Get SubDirectory
00125             foreach (DirectoryInfo dir in rootDirectory.GetDirectories()) {
00126                 if (this.showHiddenFile == true || !dir.Name.StartsWith("."))
00127                     AddDirectory(dir.FullName);
00128             }
00129 
00130             // Get Files
00131             foreach (FileInfo file in rootDirectory.GetFiles()) {
00132                 if (this.showHiddenFile == true || !file.Name.StartsWith("."))
00133                     AddFile(file.FullName);
00134             }
00135         }
00136 
00138         public void Remove (string path) {
00139             Gtk.TreeIter iter = GetIter(path);
00140             this.Remove(ref iter);
00141         }
00142 
00144         public Gtk.TreeIter GetIter (string path) {
00145             this.fPath = path;
00146             this.fIter = Gtk.TreeIter.Zero;
00147             this.Foreach(GetIterForeach);
00148             this.fPath = null;
00149             return(this.fIter);
00150         }
00151 
00153         public string GetFilePath (TreePath path) {
00154             TreeIter iter;
00155             GetIter(out iter, path);
00156             return((string) GetValue(iter, COL_PATH));
00157         }
00158 
00160         public string GetFilePath (TreeIter iter) {
00161             return((string) GetValue(iter, COL_PATH));
00162         }
00163 
00165         public string GetFileName (TreePath path) {
00166             TreeIter iter;
00167             GetIter(out iter, path);
00168             return((string) GetValue(iter, COL_NAME));
00169         }
00170 
00172         public string GetFileName (TreeIter iter) {
00173             return((string) GetValue(iter, COL_NAME));
00174         }
00175 
00177         public Gdk.Pixbuf GetPixbuf (TreePath path) {
00178             TreeIter iter;
00179             GetIter(out iter, path);
00180             return((Gdk.Pixbuf) GetValue(iter, COL_PIXBUF));
00181         }
00182 
00184         public Gdk.Pixbuf GetPixbuf (TreeIter iter) {
00185             return((Gdk.Pixbuf) GetValue(iter, COL_PIXBUF));
00186         }
00187 
00189         public bool GetIsDirectory (TreePath path) {
00190             TreeIter iter;
00191             GetIter(out iter, path);
00192             return((bool) GetValue(iter, COL_IS_DIRECTORY));
00193         }
00194 
00196         public bool GetIsDirectory (TreeIter iter) {
00197             return((bool) GetValue(iter, COL_IS_DIRECTORY));
00198         }
00199 
00201         public void SetPixbuf (TreeIter iter, Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf) {
00202             SetValue(iter, COL_PIXBUF, pixbuf);
00203         }
00204 
00205         // ============================================
00206         // PROTECTED Methods
00207         // ============================================
00209         protected string GetIconTypeName (FileInfo fileInfo) {
00210             string ext = fileInfo.Extension;
00211             if (ext != null && ext != "") {
00212                 ext = ext.Remove(0, 1);
00213                 ext = TextUtils.UpFirstChar(ext);
00214             } else {
00215                 ext = null;
00216             }
00217             return(ext);
00218         }
00219 
00220         // ============================================
00221         // PRIVATE Methods
00222         // ============================================
00223         private int StoreSortFunc (TreeModel model, TreeIter a, TreeIter b) {
00224             // Sort Folders Before Files
00225             bool a_is_dir = (bool) model.GetValue(a, COL_IS_DIRECTORY);
00226             bool b_is_dir = (bool) model.GetValue(b, COL_IS_DIRECTORY);
00227             string a_name = (string) model.GetValue(a, COL_NAME);
00228             string b_name = (string) model.GetValue(b, COL_NAME);
00229     
00230             if (!a_is_dir && b_is_dir) {
00231                 return(1);
00232             } else if (a_is_dir && !b_is_dir) {
00233                 return(-1);
00234             }
00235     
00236             return(String.Compare(a_name, b_name));
00237         }
00238 
00239         private bool GetIterForeach (TreeModel model, TreePath path, TreeIter iter) {
00240             lock (this.fPath) {
00241                 if (GetFilePath(iter) == this.fPath) {
00242                     this.fIter = iter;
00243                     return(true);
00244                 }
00245                 return(false);
00246             }
00247         }
00248 
00249         private TreeIter InsertData (string path, string name, 
00250                                      Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf, bool isDir)
00251         {
00252             if (isEmpty == true) {
00253                 base.Clear();
00254                 isEmpty = !isEmpty;
00255             }
00256             return(AppendValues(path, name, pixbuf, isDir));
00257         }
00258 
00259         // ============================================
00260         // PUBLIC Properties
00261         // ============================================
00263         public bool ShowHiddenFile {
00264             get { return(this.showHiddenFile); }
00265             set { this.showHiddenFile = value; }
00266         }
00267     }
00268 }
